name: eca0600u
label: recommendation for secondary school twin 2 (m/f/n/g)

name: eca0601t
label: transition decision twin 1 (m/f/n/g)

labels: 2: The other parent made the decision.
3: We, i.e. both parents, made the decision together.
4: The child primarily decided what kind of secondary school he/she wanted to go to.
5: The decision was made together with the child and one or both parents.
6: There was no possibility to decide, the recommendation was binding.

name: eca0601u
label: transition decision twin 2 (m/f/n/g)

labels: 2: The other parent made the decision.
3: We, i.e. both parents, made the decision together.
4: The child primarily decided what kind of secondary school he/she wanted to go to.
5: The decision was made together with the child and one or both parents.
6: There was no possibility to decide, the recommendation was binding.
